verses.verse: וַיֵּאָסְפ֤וּ <WH622> vai-ye-'a-se-Fu gathered themselves together כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ke-'Ish man אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, as one אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at הָ֣רְח֔וֹב <WH7339> ha-re-Chov, into the street אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> sha-'ar- gate הַמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim; the water וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and they spake לְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> le-'ez-Ra unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer, the scribe לְהָבִ֗יא <WH935> le-ha-Vi, to bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- סֵ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> se-fer the book תּוֹרַ֣ת <WH8451> to-Rat of the law מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, of Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. to Israel

וַיָּבִ֣יא <WH935> vai-ya-Vi brought עֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַ֠כֹּהֵן <WH3548> Hak-ko-hen the priest אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- הַתּוֹרָ֞ה <WH8451> hat-to-Rah the law לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הַקָּהָל֙ <WH6951> hak-ka-Hal the congregation מֵאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> me-'Ish both of men וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- against אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> 'ish-Shah, and women וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol and all מֵבִ֣ין <WH995> me-Vin with understanding לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a'; and all that could hear בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> 'e-Chad upon the first לַחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> la-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I. of the seventh

וַיִּקְרָא־ <WH7121> vai-yik-ra- And he read בוֹ֩ vo לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei therein before הָרְח֜וֹב <WH7339> ha-re-Chov the street אֲשֶׁ֣ר׀ <WH834> 'a-Sher which לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei that [was] before שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> sha-'ar- gate הַמַּ֗יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim, the water מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הָאוֹר֙ <WH216> ha-'Or from the morning עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until מַחֲצִ֣ית <WH4276> ma-cha-Tzit half הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom, in נֶ֛גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged the presence הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim of men וְהַנָּשִׁ֖ים <WH802> ve-han-na-Shim and the women וְהַמְּבִינִ֑ים <WH995> ve-ham-me-vi-Nim; and those that could understand וְאָזְנֵ֥י <WH241> ve-'a-ze-Nei and the ears כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of all the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to סֵ֥פֶר <WH5612> Se-fer [were attentive] unto the book הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> hat-to-Rah. of the law

וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֞ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod stood עֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer, the scribe עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon מִגְדַּל־ <WH4026> mig-dal- upon a pulpit עֵץ֮ <WH6086> 'etz of wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which עָשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> 'a-Su which they had made לַדָּבָר֒ <WH1697> lad-da-Var for the purpose וַיַּֽעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-Mod him stood אֶצְל֡וֹ <WH681> etz-Lo and beside מַתִּתְיָ֡ה <WH4993> mat-tit-Yah Mattithiah וְשֶׁ֡מַע <WH8087> ve-She-ma' and Shema וַ֠עֲנָיָה <WH6043> Va-'a-na-yah and Anaiah וְאוּרִיָּ֧ה <WH223> ve-'u-ri-Yah and Urijah וְחִלְקִיָּ֛ה <WH2518> ve-chil-ki-Yah and Hilkiah וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖ה <WH4641> u-ma-'a-se-Yah and Maaseiah עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on יְמִינ֑וֹ <WH3225> ye-mi-No; on his right hand וּמִשְּׂמֹאל֗וֹ <WH8040> u-mis-se-mo-Lo, and on his left hand פְּ֠דָיָה <WH6305> Pe-da-yah Pedaiah וּמִֽישָׁאֵ֧ל <WH4332> u-mi-sha-'El and Mishael וּמַלְכִּיָּ֛ה <WH4441> u-mal-ki-Yah and Malchiah וְחָשֻׁ֥ם <WH2828> ve-cha-Shum and Hashum וְחַשְׁבַּדָּ֖נָה <WH2806> ve-chash-bad-Da-nah and Hashbadana זְכַרְיָ֥ה <WH2148> ze-char-Yah Zechariah מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <WH4918> me-shul-Lam. [and] Meshullam פ Peh

וַיִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> vai-yif-Tach opened עֶזְרָ֤א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra And Ezra הַסֵּ֙פֶר֙ <WH5612> has-Se-fer the book לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> le-'ei-Nei in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> chol of all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of all the people כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> me-'Al and כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am it all the people הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> ha-Yah; become וּכְפִתְח֖וֹ <WH6605> u-che-fit-Cho opened עָֽמְד֥וּ <WH5975> 'a-me-Du stood up כָל־ <WH3605> chol all הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. the people

וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <WH1288> vay-Va-rech blessed עֶזְרָ֔א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra, And Ezra אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him God הַגָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> hag-ga-Dol; the great וַיַּֽעֲנ֨וּ <WH6030> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people אָמֵ֤ן׀ <WH543> 'a-Men Amen אָמֵן֙ <WH543> 'a-Men Amen בְּמֹ֣עַל <WH4607> be-Mo-'al with lifting up יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem, their hands וַיִּקְּד֧וּ <WH6915> vai-yik-ke-Du and they bowed וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲוֻּ֛ <WH7812> vai-yish-ta-cha-Vu their heads and worshipped לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אַפַּ֥יִם <WH639> 'ap-Pa-yim with [their] faces אָֽרְצָה׃ <WH776> 'A-re-tzah. to the ground

וְיֵשׁ֡וּעַ <WH3442> ve-ye-Shu-a' Also Jeshua וּבָנִ֡י <WH1137> u-va-Ni and Bani וְשֵׁרֵ֥בְיָ֣ה׀ <WH8274> ve-she-Re-ve-Yah and Sherebiah יָמִ֡ין <WH3226> ya-Min Jamin עַקּ֡וּב <WH6126> 'ak-Kuv Akkub שַׁבְּתַ֣י׀ <WH7678> shab-be-Tai Shabbethai הֽוֹדִיָּ֡ה <WH1941> ho-di-Yah Hodijah מַעֲשֵׂיָ֡ה <WH4641> ma-'a-se-Yah Maaseiah קְלִיטָ֣א <WH7042> ke-li-Ta Kelita עֲזַרְיָה֩ <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah Azariah יוֹזָבָ֨ד <WH3107> yo-za-Vad Jozabad חָנָ֤ן <WH2605> cha-Nan Hanan פְּלָאיָה֙ <WH6411> pe-la-Yah Pelaiah וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites מְבִינִ֥ים <WH995> me-vi-Nim to understand אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am caused the people לַתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> lat-to-Rah; the law וְהָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ve-ha-'Am and the people עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עָמְדָֽם׃ <WH5975> 'a-me-Dam. abide

וַֽיִּקְרְא֥וּ <WH7121> vai-yik-re-'U So they read בַסֵּ֛פֶר <WH5612> vas-Se-fer in the book בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> be-to-Rat in the law הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him of God מְפֹרָ֑שׁ <WH6567> me-fo-Rash; distinctly וְשׂ֣וֹם <WH7760> ve-Som and gave שֶׂ֔כֶל <WH7922> Se-chel, the sense וַיָּבִ֖ינוּ <WH995> vai-ya-Vi-nu and caused [them] to understand בַּמִּקְרָֽא׃ <WH4744> bam-mik-Ra. the reading ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <WH5166> ne-chem-Yah And Nehemiah ה֣וּא <WH1931> hu who הַתִּרְשָׁ֡תָא <WH8660> hat-tir-Sha-ta which [is] the Tirshatha וְעֶזְרָ֣א <WH5830> ve-'ez-Ra and Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֣ן׀ <WH3548> hak-ko-Hen the priest הַסֹּפֵ֡ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer the scribe וְהַלְוִיִּם֩ <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim and the Levites הַמְּבִינִ֨ים <WH995> ham-me-vi-Nim that taught אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am the people לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol to all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, unto all the people הַיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom This day קָדֹֽשׁ־ <WH6918> ka-dosh- [is] holy הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu This לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Chem, your God אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּֽתְאַבְּל֖וּ <WH56> tit-'ab-be-Lu mourn וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תִּבְכּ֑וּ <WH1058> tiv-Ku; not nor weep כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for בוֹכִים֙ <WH1058> vo-Chim wept כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- for all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, For all the people כְּשָׁמְעָ֖ם <WH8085> ke-sha-me-'Am when they heard אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> hat-to-Rah. of the law

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer Then he said לָהֶ֡ם la-Hem לְכוּ֩ <WH1980> le-Chu Go אִכְל֨וּ <WH398> 'ich-Lu eat מַשְׁמַנִּ֜ים <WH4924> mash-man-Nim the fat וּשְׁת֣וּ <WH8354> u-she-Tu and drink מַֽמְתַקִּ֗ים <WH4477> mam-tak-Kim, the sweet וְשִׁלְח֤וּ <WH7971> ve-shil-Chu and send מָנוֹת֙ <WH4490> ma-nOt portions לְאֵ֣ין <WH369> le-'Ein has nothing נָכ֣וֹן <WH3559> na-Chon unto them for whom nothing is prepared ל֔וֹ lo, כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh [is] holy הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom for [this] day לַאֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <WH136> la-'a-do-Nei-nu; to our Lord וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תֵּ֣עָצֵ֔בוּ <WH6087> te-'a-Tze-vu, neither be ye sorry כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for חֶדְוַ֥ת <WH2304> ched-Vat for the joy יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD הִ֥יא <WH1931> hi he מָֽעֻזְּכֶֽם׃ <WH4581> Ma-'uz-ze-Chem. is your strength

וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim So the Levites מַחְשִׁ֤ים <WH2814> mach-Shim stilled לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> ha-'Am all the people לֵאמֹ֣ר <WH559> le-Mor saying הַ֔סּוּ <WH2013> Has-su, Hold your peace כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for הַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom for the day קָדֹ֑שׁ <WH6918> ka-Dosh; [is] holy וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תֵּעָצֵֽבוּ׃ <WH6087> te-'a-Tze-vu. neither be ye grieved

וַיֵּלְכ֨וּ <WH1980> vai-ye-le-Chu went כָל־ <WH3605> chol All הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> ha-'Am And all the people לֶאֱכֹ֤ל <WH398> le-'e-Chol to eat וְלִשְׁתּוֹת֙ <WH8354> ve-lish-tOt and to drink וּלְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> u-le-shal-Lach and to send מָנ֔וֹת <WH4490> ma-Not, portions וְלַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> ve-la-'a-Sot and to make שִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> sim-Chah mirth גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> ge-do-Lah; great כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki because הֵבִ֙ינוּ֙ <WH995> he-Vi-nu because they had understood בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <WH1697> bad-de-va-Rim, the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which הוֹדִ֖יעוּ <WH3045> ho-Di-'u that were declared לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem. ס sa-Mek

וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> u-vai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֡י <WH8145> hash-she-Ni And on the second נֶאֶסְפוּ֩ <WH622> ne-'es-Fu were gathered together רָאשֵׁ֨י <WH7218> ra-Shei the chief הָאָב֜וֹת <WH1> ha-'a-Vot of the fathers לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of all the people הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> hak-ko-ha-Nim the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to עֶזְרָ֖א <WH5830> 'ez-Ra unto Ezra הַסֹּפֵ֑ר <WH5608> has-so-Fer; the scribe וּלְהַשְׂכִּ֖יל <WH7919> u-le-has-Kil even to understand אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei the words הַתּוֹרָֽה׃ <WH8451> hat-to-Rah. of the law

וַֽיִּמְצְא֖וּ <WH4672> vai-yim-tze-'U And they found כָּת֣וּב <WH3789> ka-Tuv written בַּתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> bat-to-Rah; in the law אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher how צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah had commanded יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, Moses אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher how יֵשְׁב֨וּ <WH3427> ye-she-Vu should dwell בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בַּסֻּכּ֛וֹת <WH5521> bas-suk-Kot in booths בֶּחָ֖ג <WH2282> be-Chag in the feast בַּחֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH2320> ba-Cho-desh month הַשְּׁבִיעִֽי׃ <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I. of the seventh

וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher after יַשְׁמִ֗יעוּ <WH8085> yash-Mi-'u, And that they should publish וְיַעֲבִ֨ירוּ <WH5674> ve-ya-'a-Vi-ru and circulated ק֥וֹל <WH6963> Kol A proclamation בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all עָרֵיהֶם֮ <WH5892> 'a-rei-Hem in all their cities וּבִירוּשָׁלִַ֣ם <WH3389> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim and in Jerusalem לֵאמֹר֒ <WH559> le-Mor saying צְא֣וּ <WH3318> tze-'U Go forth הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> ha-Har, unto the mount וְהָבִ֙יאוּ֙ <WH935> ve-ha-Vi-'u and fetch עֲלֵי־ <WH5929> 'a-lei- branches זַ֙יִת֙ <WH2132> za-yit olive וַעֲלֵי־ <WH5929> va-'a-lei- branches עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz trees שֶׁ֔מֶן <WH8081> She-men, and pine וַעֲלֵ֤י <WH5929> va-'a-Lei branches הֲדַס֙ <WH1918> ha-Das and myrtle וַעֲלֵ֣י <WH5929> va-'a-Lei and branches תְמָרִ֔ים <WH8558> te-ma-Rim, and palm וַעֲלֵ֖י <WH5929> va-'a-Lei and branches עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz trees עָבֹ֑ת <WH5687> 'a-Vot; of thick לַעֲשֹׂ֥ת <WH6213> la-'a-Sot to make סֻכֹּ֖ת <WH5521> suk-Kot booths כַּכָּתֽוּב׃ <WH3789> kak-ka-Tuv. as [it is] written פ Peh

וַיֵּצְא֣וּ <WH3318> vai-ye-tze-'U went forth הָעָם֮ <WH5971> ha-'Am So the people וַיָּבִיאוּ֒ <WH935> vai-ya-vi-'U and brought וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <WH6213> vai-ya-'a-Su [them] and made לָהֶ֨ם <WH1992> la-Hem like סֻכּ֜וֹת <WH5521> suk-Kot themselves booths אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> 'ish every one עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on גַּגּוֹ֙ <WH1406> gag-Go upon the roof of his house וּבְחַצְרֹ֣תֵיהֶ֔ם <WH2691> u-ve-chatz-Ro-tei-Hem, and in their courts וּבְחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> u-ve-chatz-Rot and in the courts בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God וּבִרְחוֹב֙ <WH7339> u-vir-chOv and in the street שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar gate הַמַּ֔יִם <WH4325> ham-Ma-yim, of the water וּבִרְח֖וֹב <WH7339> u-vir-Chov and in the street שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> Sha-'ar of the gate אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim. of Ephraim
